description: Gap: Mitigation overshoot scenario with low radiative forcing by the end of the century.  Following approximately the RCP2.6 overshoot global forcing pathway with SSP1 socioeconomic conditions. Radiative forcing overshoots 2.6 W/m2 within the 21st Century before reducing to 2.6 W/m2 in 2100. Concentration-driven.
keywords: ScenarioMIP, Tier 2, Scenario, SSP, RCP, SSP1, RCP2.6 over, future, Overshoot, Gap: Mitigation
long_name: RCP2.6 overshoot scenario based on SSP1
rationale: The scenario fills a gap in existing climate simulations by investigating the implications of a substantial 21st century overshoot in radiative forcing relative to a longer-term target.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description:
Impose RCP2.6-overshoot forcing.
Radiative forcing overshoots 2.6 W/m2 within the 21st Century before reducing to 2.6 W/m2 in 2100.
requirements.keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 2.6, future, 21st century, SSP1, RCP2.6 overshoot
requirements.label: RCP26 overshoot Forcing

requirements.description: Initialisation is from the end of the Historical experiment.  To provide continuity between simulations of the recent past and  future scenario simulations.
requirements.label: HistoricalInitialisation

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model
requirements.label: AOGCM Configuration
